reviews.review:
So... this game was not what i expected.
I thought this was supposed to be a more serious title, but i had never played until now,
So, the Gameplay is pretty solid. Portal gun is pretty fun to use.
Game wasn't that difficult, i have yet to play the bonus maps (Which i plan on beating at some point) 
also the humor honestly surprised me! i thought this was just a simple little puzzle game. Not that its a bad thing, i just had never seen much of the game until now
So uh yeah all in all. game was fun, a lil short, not to hard, and pretty funny.

14 years later and It's still a great game, If you've been missing out then that's on you

Plus it's only ¬£7, go buy it!
This is thew best game ever
this game is my anus after curry oh my fuck it hurt so bad and i had a test and it literally was pain i think i got a fucking 48 or some shit idfk good game.
The eerie feeling had me on edge the entire time, especially during the later chapters.  All the puzzles were super fun and well thought out.  Would highly recommend for anyone.
ta weno, compralo y disfrutalo que a mi no me anda
This game is just so fun and addictive!
Juegazo, me pas√© horas jugando en solo y es divertido
p o r t a l
This is probably one of the best games.

Allora, partiamo dal fatto che avendo giocato prima al secondo, non mi aspettavo sorprese dal primo; campagna corta ma accettabile come inizio, test abbastanza difficili e personaggi o personaggio accettabili.
Dico solo questo perch√® √® da ammettere che Portal 2 √® di gran lunga pi√π grande in moltissimi aspetti: storia pi√π lunga ed elaborata, test pi√π difficili ecc. 
Ma non penso che Portal 1 sia uno spreco, penso che abbiano visto che ne √® uscito bene ed hanno voluto ingrandirlo con un sequel pienamente accettabile e consigliabile, anche perch√®, come ho detto prima, ha una campagna milgiore. Perci√≤ vi invito a leggere la mia recensione su portal 2 che √® molto piu elaborata sul gameplay e altro.

VOTO 8/10

My recorded 31 hours doesn't do my time in this game justice. It doesn't take into account the time I spent at my friends' houses playing with them, or watching them play online, or talking about the game. I'm not the best gamer, but for my casual needs, Portal has always been a favorite.

Just finished portal 1 and 2 back to back for the first time since 2012 and I've got to say the "horror" element is much more apparent in the first title. The pristine and seemingly hermetically sealed test chambers really leave you with a greater sense of unease than the worn test chambers of the second. The story in this game is very light, so if you played the second first, you won't find a ton of lore here to catch up on. Nevertheless, was well worth then play in 2007 and 2012 and is still well worth the play in 2020, regardless of the sequel. A timeless classic, in classic Valve style.
I have played Half-life previously a lot of times and this game is almost same, I really like it. Thumbs up!

This game was actually really good. I recommend playing the portal and half-life series together for a pretty cool experience. Overall the atmosphere is really good and makes me want to find out more about this game world.
This is logic game. I recommend you!

10/10 Recommended. Best puzzle game of all time

it's crazy how this short 2 hour experience keeps me coming back.
it's a blast doing the bonus challenges, replaying the game for secrets that I still keep finding to this day, or just messing around with mods.
the mechanics will never cease to be some of the most innovative, unique, and fun pieces of work.
ITS A GREAT GAME ME AND FRIENDS PLAY IT ALL THE TIME
OF COURSE I LOVE THIS GAME. Play it.
